level.heading: International application of chapter.
level.text: The Superior Court may treat a foreign country as if it were a state for the purpose of applying this subchapter and Subchapters II, III, and V [of this chapter].

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-270
level.text: For Law 17-270, see notes following ยง 21-2401.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 103 of the Uniform Adult Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Jurisdiction Act.
